p.else: If it is already ticked, you may not try a second time - return to 327.

section.p: Sweat forms on your brow and upper lip as you try to attune your own magical energies to those beneath the pool.

If you fail, return to 327.
Otherwise read on.

You manage a supreme feat of sorcerous skill. The surface of the pool is broken by a shimmering jade blade, which drifts slowly towards you, attracted by pure arcane energy. It is a Jade Defender, an enchanted sword of whose kind there are few left in the Fabled Lands. Note the
on your Adventure Sheet. In effect the Jade Defender raises your Defence by 6 through its COMBAT and Defence bonuses.
